text: Johanan ga helekai hagammuni gi mee, “Dugua mai Ishmael gi di au e daaligi gii made hagammuni, deai tangada e iloo ai. Dehee tadinga bolo e dugu a mee e daaligi goe gii made? Di mee deenei dela gaa hidi ai digau o Jew ala nogo i doo baahi ga mooho gi daha, deenei ga hidi mai di haingadaa gi hongo nia daangada huogodoo ala e dubu i Judah.”
